title: Area Destabilization
description: How excessive corruption dismantles a location

data.name: Bleed
data.effect: Anything within slowly leaks without. Chests pour contents, packs drop items (1d4/round), plants drip water, characters lose blood (1d4 damage).

data.name: Combustion
data.effect: Each round a random object begins to smoke. Unless removed from the area, it ignites in the next.

data.name: Command
data.effect: Each character must make a RES check. Those who fail become enthralled to those who passed until they leave the area.

data.name: Conflagration
data.effect: Erupting in to violent flame, everything in the room is consumed. 1d4 rounds of immense heat beforehand serves as warning.

data.name: Dislocate
data.effect: An exit (or a cardinal direction, in an open area) leads somewhere else. It may still be entered as normal.

data.name: Firestorm
data.effect: Like slow, thick droplets of rain, fire pools together and falls from above (2 damage per round, anything flammable burns).

data.name: Flood
data.effect: The area is underwater. Maximum 10' height, 10' width. Stops at walls, ceilings, and portals. Forms a vertical wall of water in open spaces.

data.name: Freeze
data.effect: In a flash, all is wrapped in shell of ice. Characters must pass a STR check to break free.

data.name: Gate
data.effect: A hole tears through space leading to a random nearby location.

data.name: Gravity Well
data.effect: All weight increases dramatically. STR check at beginning of any segment or the character is pulled to the ground and spends the segment fighting to stand up.

data.name: Lethargy
data.effect: Make a Resolute check to crawl at half speed. Otherwise, sleep for one round. No other action may be taken.

data.name: Lightveins
data.effect: Bright, thin roots spread outward, marbling the air. The entire space is illuminated to an almost blinding degree, leaving no shadows. All things pass through them as if they were non-existent.

data.name: Mass Mutation
data.effect: Every living thing in the room rolls 1d20 and consults the Mutative Corruption table.

data.name: Refraction
data.effect: Visual information swims and sways (-5 to anything relying on sight).

data.name: Shatter
data.effect: As a ball through glass, part of a surface breaks away, leaving massive cracks spidering across every other surface. May open to neighboring rooms, floors, etc.

data.name: Silent
data.effect: No sound can be made. Anything beyond may still be heard.

data.name: Soak: Oil
data.effect: Precipitating like dew, a random mix of oils and fats coat every surface (slick, flammable).

data.name: Soak: Water
data.effect: In an instant, the aftermath of a day long rainstorm. Fires are doused.

data.name: Thunderstorm
data.effect: Thick fog fills the area, lightning strikes a random target each round (1d12 damage).

data.name: Timewaves
data.effect: Each round, QUI is randomly halved or doubled. Reverse the effect if a character moves.

data.name: Unmoor
data.effect: No longer bound by gravity, everyone and everything floats. Characters and objects may get stuck in open spaces if their momentum is halted.

data.name: Vanish
data.effect: Everything in the area is invisible. Anything beyond may still be seen.

data.name: Violent Wind
data.effect: Whipping in all directions, all light objects become projectiles (persistent, random target, 1d4 damage).
